thread.title: Ryan Says Trump Respects the Separation of Powers
thread.title_full: Ryan Says Trump Respects the Separation of Powers - WSJ

author: Kristina Peterson
title: Ryan Says Trump Respects the Separation of Powers
text:
WASHINGTON—House Speaker Paul Ryan (R., Wis.) on Tuesday played down President Donald Trump’s Twitter attacks on the federal judge who blocked his temporary travel ban, saying that the administration’s actions still showed respect for the judicial process.
Mr. Ryan didn’t chastise Mr. Trump for criticizing U.S. District Judge James Robart in an early Saturday morning tweet calling him “this so-called judge.” Mr. Trump wrote on social media that the ruling was “ridiculous and will be overturned!” Mr. Trump later suggested...
